channel.title: Zombie Scape Development [317]
channel.description:
[center][size=14pt][ Zombie Scape ][/size] Current Version: Not Released[/center] Aim: To create a server based on surviving in the zombie appocalypse with modern weapons/technologies and facing realistic zombies.
What will this server have? Weapons 70% Point System 100% Classes (army, special ops, civillian) 100% Custom Store NPC's 100% Ammunition 100% Animated Zombie NPC's 50% Quests 10% Clothing/Outfits 0% Zombie Minigames 0%
[size=12pt][b] Weapons:[/b][/size] Colt45 Done Desert Eagle Done Revolver MP5 Done Uzi Done P90 AK47 Done Lr300 Done Fn Scar In Progress M4 Carbine Dragunov Done Spas 12 In Progress Chainsaw RPG Taser Done Flamethrower In Progress
[b]Addons:[/b] Grenade Launcher Done 10x Scope Done Red Dot Sight Silencer Done Makeshift Scope [b] Items:[/b] Morphine Done Steroids Done
[b]Ammunition:[/b] Standard Ammunition Done 5/5
[size=12pt][b]NPC's:[/b][/size] Zombie Base Model Animated Done Zombie Varients Army Commando Done Special Ops Stealth Ninja Done Civillian Leader Done Army Varients Done 1/4 Special Ops Varients Done 3/4 Civillian Varients Done 4/4
[size=12pt][b]Objects:[/b][/size] Ammo Crates Done Ammo Boxes Done Rotting Corpses Dead Corpses Mutilated Corpses Charred Corpses
[size=12pt][b]Clothing/Outfits:[/b][/size] Cadet Gear Army Gear Lieutenant Outfit General Officer Outfit Special Agent Suit Special Ops Gear Stealth Armour Makeshift Armour Recon Armour Power Armour
[size=12pt][b]Quests:[/b][/size] Find My Husband Done
[size=12pt][b]Minigames[/b][/size] Shilo Villiage Zombie Waves Minigame Mort'ton Zombie Waves Minigame Abandoned Mine Exploration Minigame [size=12pt][b] Pictures:[/b][/size]
[u]Classes[/u] [IMG]http://i98.photobucket.com/albums/l253/wayzey/zombie2-1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i98.photobucket.com/albums/l253/wayzey/zombie3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i98.photobucket.com/albums/l253/wayzey/zombie4.jpg[/img]
[u]ZOMBIES![/u] [IMG]http://i98.photobucket.com/albums/l253/wayzey/zombie5.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i98.photobucket.com/albums/l253/wayzey/Zombie6.jpg[/img] [u] Civillian and Special ops Varients[/u] [IMG]http://i98.photobucket.com/albums/l253/wayzey/zombie7.jpg[/img] [u] AK47[/u] [IMG]http://i98.photobucket.com/albums/l253/wayzey/zombie8.jpg[/img]
[u]ADDONS[/u] [IMG]http://i98.photobucket.com/albums/l253/wayzey/zombie9.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i98.photobucket.com/albums/l253/wayzey/zombie14.jpg[/img] [b]AK47 with Grenade Launcher[/b] [IMG]http://i98.photobucket.com/albums/l253/wayzey/zombie15.jpg[/img] [b]Lr300 with Grenade Launcher[/b] [IMG]http://i98.photobucket.com/albums/l253/wayzey/zombie16.jpg[/img]
[u]Ammunition![/u] [IMG]http://i98.photobucket.com/albums/l253/wayzey/zombie10.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i98.photobucket.com/albums/l253/wayzey/zombie11.jpg[/img] [u] Quests[/u] [IMG]http://i98.photobucket.com/albums/l253/wayzey/Zombie12.jpg[/img]
[u]List of Weapons[/u] (So far) [IMG]http://i98.photobucket.com/albums/l253/wayzey/Zombie13.jpg[/img]
[size=12pt][b]Owners[/b][/size] Wayzey Tatemo Jboy
All custom models are made by me, most of the coding is done by tatemo and Site/Graphics are done by Jboy We don't need help or anyone else to code so don't ask.
We'd like suggestions and don't mind if you ask questions so yer.

item.title: Zombie Scape Development [317]
item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

[quote=“chase scape, post:46, topic:282106”][quote author=wayzey link=topic=372752.msg2812977#msg2812977 date=1244105972]

This is Cocoa’s project, and you have no proof of this development so I wouldn’t post this at all.

Are you retarded? Sorry but Cocoas Nazi Zombies Project was out like ages ago and featured completely different weapons. He didn’t have NPC’s or any modern weapons. He released his weapon pack and from him I might use the Sniper and maybe the flame thrower but if I do I will credit him.

[/quote]
Big woop you added some other features this was a 100% leech and you no damn well it was[/quote]
Hate to break it to you but Cocoa’s was on a completely different bases to this. This is completely different to Cocoa’s. You obviously have cheese for brains I will be posting so more pictures soon

Read full topic
